entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Massive workflow problems #28237
  • dotnet build fails without any warning or error #28226

Closed

  • `dotnet pack` dose not work with the `Version` property offered by targets #28189

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28238
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type (#27648)" #28233
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update windows images for release/7.0.1xx #28197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2005830 #28210
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing line that redirects jobs to helix staging environment #28232
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28209
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2006631 #27667
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Increase cache assets file format version to 11 in 7.0.1xx #28222
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Increase version of asset cache file format to 12 #28218
    Area-ReadyToRun
